title: The Clippers Are Atop the Wacky West (for Now) | Heat Check (Ep. 343)
description:
Somehow, the Los Angeles Clippers have climbed to the best record in the crowded Western Conference (4:02), and the Philadelphia 76ers’ Jimmy Butler experiment starts to bear fruit (21:32).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Dan Devine, Dan Pfeiffer

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
